33#include <linux/kernel.h>
34#include <asm/io.h>
35#include <drm/drmP.h>

41/* Limits for overlay size. According to intel doc, the real limits are:
42 * Y width: 4095, UV width (planar): 2047, Y height: 2047,
43 * UV width (planar): * 1023. But the xorg thinks 2048 for height and width. Use
44 * the mininum of both. */
45#define IMAGE_MAX_WIDTH 2048
46#define IMAGE_MAX_HEIGHT 2046 /* 2 * 1023 */
47/* on 830 and 845 these large limits result in the card hanging */
48#define IMAGE_MAX_WIDTH_LEGACY 1024
49#define IMAGE_MAX_HEIGHT_LEGACY 1088
50
51/* overlay register definitions */
52/* OCMD register */
53#define OCMD_TILED_SURFACE (0x1<<19)
54#define OCMD_MIRROR_MASK (0x3<<17)
55#define OCMD_MIRROR_MODE (0x3<<17)
56#define OCMD_MIRROR_HORIZONTAL (0x1<<17)
57#define OCMD_MIRROR_VERTICAL (0x2<<17)
58#define OCMD_MIRROR_BOTH (0x3<<17)
59#define OCMD_BYTEORDER_MASK (0x3<<14) /* zero for YUYV or FOURCC YUY2 */
60#define OCMD_UV_SWAP (0x1<<14) /* YVYU */
61#define OCMD_Y_SWAP (0x2<<14) /* UYVY or FOURCC UYVY */
62#define OCMD_Y_AND_UV_SWAP (0x3<<14) /* VYUY */
63#define OCMD_SOURCE_FORMAT_MASK (0xf<<10)
64#define OCMD_RGB_888 (0x1<<10) /* not in i965 Intel docs */
65#define OCMD_RGB_555 (0x2<<10) /* not in i965 Intel docs */
66#define OCMD_RGB_565 (0x3<<10) /* not in i965 Intel docs */
67#define OCMD_YUV_422_PACKED (0x8<<10)
68#define OCMD_YUV_411_PACKED (0x9<<10) /* not in i965 Intel docs */
69#define OCMD_YUV_420_PLANAR (0xc<<10)
70#define OCMD_YUV_422_PLANAR (0xd<<10)
71#define OCMD_YUV_410_PLANAR (0xe<<10) /* also 411 */
72#define OCMD_TVSYNCFLIP_PARITY (0x1<<9)
73#define OCMD_TVSYNCFLIP_ENABLE (0x1<<7)
74#define OCMD_BUF_TYPE_MASK (0x1<<5)
75#define OCMD_BUF_TYPE_FRAME (0x0<<5)
76#define OCMD_BUF_TYPE_FIELD (0x1<<5)
77#define OCMD_TEST_MODE (0x1<<4)
78#define OCMD_BUFFER_SELECT (0x3<<2)
79#define OCMD_BUFFER0 (0x0<<2)
80#define OCMD_BUFFER1 (0x1<<2)
81#define OCMD_FIELD_SELECT (0x1<<2)
82#define OCMD_FIELD0 (0x0<<1)
83#define OCMD_FIELD1 (0x1<<1)
84#define OCMD_ENABLE (0x1<<0)
85
86/* OCONFIG register */
87#define OCONF_PIPE_MASK (0x1<<18)
88#define OCONF_PIPE_A (0x0<<18)
89#define OCONF_PIPE_B (0x1<<18)
90#define OCONF_GAMMA2_ENABLE (0x1<<16)
91#define OCONF_CSC_MODE_BT601 (0x0<<5)
92#define OCONF_CSC_MODE_BT709 (0x1<<5)
93#define OCONF_CSC_BYPASS (0x1<<4)
94#define OCONF_CC_OUT_8BIT (0x1<<3)
95#define OCONF_TEST_MODE (0x1<<2)
96#define OCONF_THREE_LINE_BUFFER (0x1<<0)
97#define OCONF_TWO_LINE_BUFFER (0x0<<0)
98
99/* DCLRKM (dst-key) register */
100#define DST_KEY_ENABLE (0x1<<31)
101#define CLK_RGB24_MASK 0x0
102#define CLK_RGB16_MASK 0x070307
103#define CLK_RGB15_MASK 0x070707
104#define CLK_RGB8I_MASK 0xffffff
105
106#define RGB16_TO_COLORKEY(c) \
107 (((c & 0xF800) << 8) | ((c & 0x07E0) << 5) | ((c & 0x001F) << 3))
108#define RGB15_TO_COLORKEY(c) \
109 (((c & 0x7c00) << 9) | ((c & 0x03E0) << 6) | ((c & 0x001F) << 3))
110
111/* overlay flip addr flag */
112#define OFC_UPDATE 0x1
113
114/* polyphase filter coefficients */
115#define N_HORIZ_Y_TAPS 5
116#define N_VERT_Y_TAPS 3
117#define N_HORIZ_UV_TAPS 3
118#define N_VERT_UV_TAPS 3
119#define N_PHASES 17
120#define MAX_TAPS 5
121
122/* memory bufferd overlay registers */
123struct overlay_registers {
124 u32 OBUF_0Y;
125 u32 OBUF_1Y;
126 u32 OBUF_0U;
127 u32 OBUF_0V;
128 u32 OBUF_1U;
129 u32 OBUF_1V;
130 u32 OSTRIDE;
131 u32 YRGB_VPH;
132 u32 UV_VPH;
133 u32 HORZ_PH;
134 u32 INIT_PHS;
135 u32 DWINPOS;
136 u32 DWINSZ;
137 u32 SWIDTH;
138 u32 SWIDTHSW;
139 u32 SHEIGHT;
140 u32 YRGBSCALE;
141 u32 UVSCALE;
142 u32 OCLRC0;
143 u32 OCLRC1;
144 u32 DCLRKV;
145 u32 DCLRKM;
146 u32 SCLRKVH;
147 u32 SCLRKVL;
148 u32 SCLRKEN;
149 u32 OCONFIG;
150 u32 OCMD;
151 u32 RESERVED1; /* 0x6C */
152 u32 OSTART_0Y;
153 u32 OSTART_1Y;
154 u32 OSTART_0U;
155 u32 OSTART_0V;
156 u32 OSTART_1U;
157 u32 OSTART_1V;
158 u32 OTILEOFF_0Y;
159 u32 OTILEOFF_1Y;
160 u32 OTILEOFF_0U;
161 u32 OTILEOFF_0V;
162 u32 OTILEOFF_1U;
163 u32 OTILEOFF_1V;
164 u32 FASTHSCALE; /* 0xA0 */
165 u32 UVSCALEV; /* 0xA4 */
166 u32 RESERVEDC[(0x200 - 0xA8) / 4]; /* 0xA8 - 0x1FC */
167 u16 Y_VCOEFS[N_VERT_Y_TAPS * N_PHASES]; /* 0x200 */
168 u16 RESERVEDD[0x100 / 2 - N_VERT_Y_TAPS * N_PHASES];
169 u16 Y_HCOEFS[N_HORIZ_Y_TAPS * N_PHASES]; /* 0x300 */
170 u16 RESERVEDE[0x200 / 2 - N_HORIZ_Y_TAPS * N_PHASES];
171 u16 UV_VCOEFS[N_VERT_UV_TAPS * N_PHASES]; /* 0x500 */
172 u16 RESERVEDF[0x100 / 2 - N_VERT_UV_TAPS * N_PHASES];
173 u16 UV_HCOEFS[N_HORIZ_UV_TAPS * N_PHASES]; /* 0x600 */
174 u16 RESERVEDG[0x100 / 2 - N_HORIZ_UV_TAPS * N_PHASES];
175};
176
177#ifdef __NetBSD__ /* XXX intel overlay iomem */
178# define __intel_overlay_iomem
179# define __iomem __intel_overlay_iomem
180
181static inline void
182iowrite32(uint32_t value, uint32_t __intel_overlay_iomem *ptr)
183{
184
185 __insn_barrier();
186 *ptr = value;
187}
188#endif
189
190struct intel_overlay {
191 struct drm_device *dev;
192 struct intel_crtc *crtc;
193 struct drm_i915_gem_object *vid_bo;
194 struct drm_i915_gem_object *old_vid_bo;
195 bool active;
196 bool pfit_active;
197 u32 pfit_vscale_ratio; /* shifted-point number, (1<<12) == 1.0 */
198 u32 color_key:24;
199 u32 color_key_enabled:1;
200 u32 brightness, contrast, saturation;
201 u32 old_xscale, old_yscale;
202 /* register access */
203 u32 flip_addr;
204 struct drm_i915_gem_object *reg_bo;
205 /* flip handling */
206 struct drm_i915_gem_request *last_flip_req;
207 void (*flip_tail)(struct intel_overlay *);
208};
209
210static struct overlay_registers __iomem *
211intel_overlay_map_regs(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
212{
213 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = overlay->dev->dev_private;
214 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs;
215
216 if (OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(overlay->dev))
217 regs = (struct overlay_registers __iomem *)overlay->reg_bo->phys_handle->vaddr;
218 else
219 regs = io_mapping_map_wc(dev_priv->gtt.mappable,
220 i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(overlay->reg_bo));
221
222 return regs;
223}
224
225static void intel_overlay_unmap_regs(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
226 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs)
227{
228#ifdef __NetBSD__ /* XXX io mapping */
229 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = overlay->dev->dev_private;
230
231 if (!OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(overlay->dev))
232 io_mapping_unmap(dev_priv->gtt.mappable, regs);
233#else
234 if (!OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(overlay->dev))
235 io_mapping_unmap(regs);
236#endif
237}
238
239static int intel_overlay_do_wait_request(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
240 struct drm_i915_gem_request *req,
241 void (*tail)(struct intel_overlay *))
242{
243 int ret;
244
245 WARN_ON(overlay->last_flip_req);
246 i915_gem_request_assign(&overlay->last_flip_req, req);
247 i915_add_request(req);
248
249 overlay->flip_tail = tail;
250 ret = i915_wait_request(overlay->last_flip_req);
251 if (ret)
252 return ret;
253
254 i915_gem_request_assign(&overlay->last_flip_req, NULL);
255 return 0;
256}
257
258/* overlay needs to be disable in OCMD reg */
259static int intel_overlay_on(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
260{
261 struct drm_device *dev = overlay->dev;
262 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
263 struct intel_engine_cs *ring = &dev_priv->ring[RCS];
264 struct drm_i915_gem_request *req;
265 int ret;
266
267 WARN_ON(overlay->active);
268 WARN_ON(IS_I830(dev) && !(dev_priv->quirks & QUIRK_PIPEA_FORCE));
269
270 ret = i915_gem_request_alloc(ring, ring->default_context, &req);
271 if (ret)
272 return ret;
273
274 ret = intel_ring_begin(req, 4);
275 if (ret) {
276 i915_gem_request_cancel(req);
277 return ret;
278 }
279
280 overlay->active = true;
281
282 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_OVERLAY_FLIP | MI_OVERLAY_ON);
283 intel_ring_emit(ring, overlay->flip_addr | OFC_UPDATE);
284 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_WAIT_FOR_EVENT | MI_WAIT_FOR_OVERLAY_FLIP);
285 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_NOOP);
286 intel_ring_advance(ring);
287
288 return intel_overlay_do_wait_request(overlay, req, NULL);
289}
290
291/* overlay needs to be enabled in OCMD reg */
292static int intel_overlay_continue(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
293 bool load_polyphase_filter)
294{
295 struct drm_device *dev = overlay->dev;
296 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
297 struct intel_engine_cs *ring = &dev_priv->ring[RCS];
298 struct drm_i915_gem_request *req;
299 u32 flip_addr = overlay->flip_addr;
300 u32 tmp;
301 int ret;
302
303 WARN_ON(!overlay->active);
304
305 if (load_polyphase_filter)
306 flip_addr |= OFC_UPDATE;
307
308 /* check for underruns */
309 tmp = I915_READ(DOVSTA);
310 if (tmp & (1 << 17))
311 DRM_DEBUG("overlay underrun, DOVSTA: %x\n", tmp);
312
313 ret = i915_gem_request_alloc(ring, ring->default_context, &req);
314 if (ret)
315 return ret;
316
317 ret = intel_ring_begin(req, 2);
318 if (ret) {
319 i915_gem_request_cancel(req);
320 return ret;
321 }
322
323 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_OVERLAY_FLIP | MI_OVERLAY_CONTINUE);
324 intel_ring_emit(ring, flip_addr);
325 intel_ring_advance(ring);
326
327 WARN_ON(overlay->last_flip_req);
328 i915_gem_request_assign(&overlay->last_flip_req, req);
329 i915_add_request(req);
330
331 return 0;
332}
333
334static void intel_overlay_release_old_vid_tail(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
335{
336 struct drm_i915_gem_object *obj = overlay->old_vid_bo;
337
338 i915_gem_object_ggtt_unpin(obj);
339 drm_gem_object_unreference(&obj->base);
340
341 overlay->old_vid_bo = NULL;
342}
343
344static void intel_overlay_off_tail(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
345{
346 struct drm_i915_gem_object *obj = overlay->vid_bo;
347
348 /* never have the overlay hw on without showing a frame */
349 if (WARN_ON(!obj))
350 return;
351
352 i915_gem_object_ggtt_unpin(obj);
353 drm_gem_object_unreference(&obj->base);
354 overlay->vid_bo = NULL;
355
356 overlay->crtc->overlay = NULL;
357 overlay->crtc = NULL;
358 overlay->active = false;
359}
360
361/* overlay needs to be disabled in OCMD reg */
362static int intel_overlay_off(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
363{
364 struct drm_device *dev = overlay->dev;
365 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
366 struct intel_engine_cs *ring = &dev_priv->ring[RCS];
367 struct drm_i915_gem_request *req;
368 u32 flip_addr = overlay->flip_addr;
369 int ret;
370
371 WARN_ON(!overlay->active);
372
373 /* According to intel docs the overlay hw may hang (when switching
374 * off) without loading the filter coeffs. It is however unclear whether
375 * this applies to the disabling of the overlay or to the switching off
376 * of the hw. Do it in both cases */
377 flip_addr |= OFC_UPDATE;
378
379 ret = i915_gem_request_alloc(ring, ring->default_context, &req);
380 if (ret)
381 return ret;
382
383 ret = intel_ring_begin(req, 6);
384 if (ret) {
385 i915_gem_request_cancel(req);
386 return ret;
387 }
388
389 /* wait for overlay to go idle */
390 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_OVERLAY_FLIP | MI_OVERLAY_CONTINUE);
391 intel_ring_emit(ring, flip_addr);
392 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_WAIT_FOR_EVENT | MI_WAIT_FOR_OVERLAY_FLIP);
393 /* turn overlay off */
394 if (IS_I830(dev)) {
395 /* Workaround: Don't disable the overlay fully, since otherwise
396 * it dies on the next OVERLAY_ON cmd. */
397 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_NOOP);
398 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_NOOP);
399 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_NOOP);
400 } else {
401 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_OVERLAY_FLIP | MI_OVERLAY_OFF);
402 intel_ring_emit(ring, flip_addr);
403 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_WAIT_FOR_EVENT | MI_WAIT_FOR_OVERLAY_FLIP);
404 }
405 intel_ring_advance(ring);
406
407 return intel_overlay_do_wait_request(overlay, req, intel_overlay_off_tail);
408}
409
410/* recover from an interruption due to a signal
411 * We have to be careful not to repeat work forever an make forward progess. */
412static int intel_overlay_recover_from_interrupt(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
413{
414 int ret;
415
416 if (overlay->last_flip_req == NULL)
417 return 0;
418
419 ret = i915_wait_request(overlay->last_flip_req);
420 if (ret)
421 return ret;
422
423 if (overlay->flip_tail)
424 overlay->flip_tail(overlay);
425
426 i915_gem_request_assign(&overlay->last_flip_req, NULL);
427 return 0;
428}
429
430/* Wait for pending overlay flip and release old frame.
431 * Needs to be called before the overlay register are changed
432 * via intel_overlay_(un)map_regs
433 */
434static int intel_overlay_release_old_vid(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
435{
436 struct drm_device *dev = overlay->dev;
437 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
438 struct intel_engine_cs *ring = &dev_priv->ring[RCS];
439 int ret;
440
441 WARN_ON(!mutex_is_locked(&dev->struct_mutex));
442
443 /* Only wait if there is actually an old frame to release to
444 * guarantee forward progress.
445 */
446 if (!overlay->old_vid_bo)
447 return 0;
448
449 if (I915_READ(ISR) & I915_OVERLAY_PLANE_FLIP_PENDING_INTERRUPT) {
450 /* synchronous slowpath */
451 struct drm_i915_gem_request *req;
452
453 ret = i915_gem_request_alloc(ring, ring->default_context, &req);
454 if (ret)
455 return ret;
456
457 ret = intel_ring_begin(req, 2);
458 if (ret) {
459 i915_gem_request_cancel(req);
460 return ret;
461 }
462
463 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_WAIT_FOR_EVENT | MI_WAIT_FOR_OVERLAY_FLIP);
464 intel_ring_emit(ring, MI_NOOP);
465 intel_ring_advance(ring);
466
467 ret = intel_overlay_do_wait_request(overlay, req,
468 intel_overlay_release_old_vid_tail);
469 if (ret)
470 return ret;
471 }
472
473 intel_overlay_release_old_vid_tail(overlay);
474
475
476 i915_gem_track_fb(overlay->old_vid_bo, NULL,
477 INTEL_FRONTBUFFER_OVERLAY(overlay->crtc->pipe));
478 return 0;
479}
480
481void intel_overlay_reset(struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv)
482{
483 struct intel_overlay *overlay = dev_priv->overlay;
484
485 if (!overlay)
486 return;
487
488 intel_overlay_release_old_vid(overlay);
489
490 overlay->last_flip_req = NULL;
491 overlay->old_xscale = 0;
492 overlay->old_yscale = 0;
493 overlay->crtc = NULL;
494 overlay->active = false;
495}
496
497struct put_image_params {
498 int format;
499 short dst_x;
500 short dst_y;
501 short dst_w;
502 short dst_h;
503 short src_w;
504 short src_scan_h;
505 short src_scan_w;
506 short src_h;
507 short stride_Y;
508 short stride_UV;
509 int offset_Y;
510 int offset_U;
511 int offset_V;
512};
513
514static int packed_depth_bytes(u32 format)
515{
516 switch (format & I915_OVERLAY_DEPTH_MASK) {
517 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV422:
518 return 4;
519 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV411:
520 /* return 6; not implemented */
521 default:
522 return -EINVAL;
523 }
524}
525
526static int packed_width_bytes(u32 format, short width)
527{
528 switch (format & I915_OVERLAY_DEPTH_MASK) {
529 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV422:
530 return width << 1;
531 default:
532 return -EINVAL;
533 }
534}
535
536static int uv_hsubsampling(u32 format)
537{
538 switch (format & I915_OVERLAY_DEPTH_MASK) {
539 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV422:
540 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV420:
541 return 2;
542 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV411:
543 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV410:
544 return 4;
545 default:
546 return -EINVAL;
547 }
548}
549
550static int uv_vsubsampling(u32 format)
551{
552 switch (format & I915_OVERLAY_DEPTH_MASK) {
553 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV420:
554 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV410:
555 return 2;
556 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV422:
557 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV411:
558 return 1;
559 default:
560 return -EINVAL;
561 }
562}
563
564static u32 calc_swidthsw(struct drm_device *dev, u32 offset, u32 width)
565{
566 u32 mask, shift, ret;
567 if (IS_GEN2(dev)) {
568 mask = 0x1f;
569 shift = 5;
570 } else {
571 mask = 0x3f;
572 shift = 6;
573 }
574 ret = ((offset + width + mask) >> shift) - (offset >> shift);
575 if (!IS_GEN2(dev))
576 ret <<= 1;
577 ret -= 1;
578 return ret << 2;
579}
580
581static const u16 y_static_hcoeffs[N_HORIZ_Y_TAPS * N_PHASES] = {
582 0x3000, 0xb4a0, 0x1930, 0x1920, 0xb4a0,
583 0x3000, 0xb500, 0x19d0, 0x1880, 0xb440,
584 0x3000, 0xb540, 0x1a88, 0x2f80, 0xb3e0,
585 0x3000, 0xb580, 0x1b30, 0x2e20, 0xb380,
586 0x3000, 0xb5c0, 0x1bd8, 0x2cc0, 0xb320,
587 0x3020, 0xb5e0, 0x1c60, 0x2b80, 0xb2c0,
588 0x3020, 0xb5e0, 0x1cf8, 0x2a20, 0xb260,
589 0x3020, 0xb5e0, 0x1d80, 0x28e0, 0xb200,
590 0x3020, 0xb5c0, 0x1e08, 0x3f40, 0xb1c0,
591 0x3020, 0xb580, 0x1e78, 0x3ce0, 0xb160,
592 0x3040, 0xb520, 0x1ed8, 0x3aa0, 0xb120,
593 0x3040, 0xb4a0, 0x1f30, 0x3880, 0xb0e0,
594 0x3040, 0xb400, 0x1f78, 0x3680, 0xb0a0,
595 0x3020, 0xb340, 0x1fb8, 0x34a0, 0xb060,
596 0x3020, 0xb240, 0x1fe0, 0x32e0, 0xb040,
597 0x3020, 0xb140, 0x1ff8, 0x3160, 0xb020,
598 0xb000, 0x3000, 0x0800, 0x3000, 0xb000
599};
600
601static const u16 uv_static_hcoeffs[N_HORIZ_UV_TAPS * N_PHASES] = {
602 0x3000, 0x1800, 0x1800, 0xb000, 0x18d0, 0x2e60,
603 0xb000, 0x1990, 0x2ce0, 0xb020, 0x1a68, 0x2b40,
604 0xb040, 0x1b20, 0x29e0, 0xb060, 0x1bd8, 0x2880,
605 0xb080, 0x1c88, 0x3e60, 0xb0a0, 0x1d28, 0x3c00,
606 0xb0c0, 0x1db8, 0x39e0, 0xb0e0, 0x1e40, 0x37e0,
607 0xb100, 0x1eb8, 0x3620, 0xb100, 0x1f18, 0x34a0,
608 0xb100, 0x1f68, 0x3360, 0xb0e0, 0x1fa8, 0x3240,
609 0xb0c0, 0x1fe0, 0x3140, 0xb060, 0x1ff0, 0x30a0,
610 0x3000, 0x0800, 0x3000
611};
612
613static void update_polyphase_filter(struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs)
614{
615 memcpy_toio(regs->Y_HCOEFS, y_static_hcoeffs, sizeof(y_static_hcoeffs));
616 memcpy_toio(regs->UV_HCOEFS, uv_static_hcoeffs,
617 sizeof(uv_static_hcoeffs));
618}
619
620static bool update_scaling_factors(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
621 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs,
622 struct put_image_params *params)
623{
624 /* fixed point with a 12 bit shift */
625 u32 xscale, yscale, xscale_UV, yscale_UV;
626#define FP_SHIFT 12
627#define FRACT_MASK 0xfff
628 bool scale_changed = false;
629 int uv_hscale = uv_hsubsampling(params->format);
630 int uv_vscale = uv_vsubsampling(params->format);
631
632 if (params->dst_w > 1)
633 xscale = ((params->src_scan_w - 1) << FP_SHIFT)
634 /(params->dst_w);
635 else
636 xscale = 1 << FP_SHIFT;
637
638 if (params->dst_h > 1)
639 yscale = ((params->src_scan_h - 1) << FP_SHIFT)
640 /(params->dst_h);
641 else
642 yscale = 1 << FP_SHIFT;
643
644 /*if (params->format & I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PLANAR) {*/
645 xscale_UV = xscale/uv_hscale;
646 yscale_UV = yscale/uv_vscale;
647 /* make the Y scale to UV scale ratio an exact multiply */
648 xscale = xscale_UV * uv_hscale;
649 yscale = yscale_UV * uv_vscale;
650 /*} else {
651 xscale_UV = 0;
652 yscale_UV = 0;
653 }*/
654
655 if (xscale != overlay->old_xscale || yscale != overlay->old_yscale)
656 scale_changed = true;
657 overlay->old_xscale = xscale;
658 overlay->old_yscale = yscale;
659
660 iowrite32(((yscale & FRACT_MASK) << 20) |
661 ((xscale >> FP_SHIFT) << 16) |
662 ((xscale & FRACT_MASK) << 3),
663 &regs->YRGBSCALE);
664
665 iowrite32(((yscale_UV & FRACT_MASK) << 20) |
666 ((xscale_UV >> FP_SHIFT) << 16) |
667 ((xscale_UV & FRACT_MASK) << 3),
668 &regs->UVSCALE);
669
670 iowrite32((((yscale >> FP_SHIFT) << 16) |
671 ((yscale_UV >> FP_SHIFT) << 0)),
672 &regs->UVSCALEV);
673
674 if (scale_changed)
675 update_polyphase_filter(regs);
676
677 return scale_changed;
678}
679
680static void update_colorkey(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
681 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs)
682{
683 u32 key = overlay->color_key;
684 u32 flags;
685
686 flags = 0;
687 if (overlay->color_key_enabled)
688 flags |= DST_KEY_ENABLE;
689
690 switch (overlay->crtc->base.primary->fb->bits_per_pixel) {
691 case 8:
692 key = 0;
693 flags |= CLK_RGB8I_MASK;
694 break;
695
696 case 16:
697 if (overlay->crtc->base.primary->fb->depth == 15) {
698 key = RGB15_TO_COLORKEY(key);
699 flags |= CLK_RGB15_MASK;
700 } else {
701 key = RGB16_TO_COLORKEY(key);
702 flags |= CLK_RGB16_MASK;
703 }
704 break;
705
706 case 24:
707 case 32:
708 flags |= CLK_RGB24_MASK;
709 break;
710 }
711
712 iowrite32(key, &regs->DCLRKV);
713 iowrite32(flags, &regs->DCLRKM);
714}
715
716static u32 overlay_cmd_reg(struct put_image_params *params)
717{
718 u32 cmd = OCMD_ENABLE | OCMD_BUF_TYPE_FRAME | OCMD_BUFFER0;
719
720 if (params->format & I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PLANAR) {
721 switch (params->format & I915_OVERLAY_DEPTH_MASK) {
722 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV422:
723 cmd |= OCMD_YUV_422_PLANAR;
724 break;
725 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV420:
726 cmd |= OCMD_YUV_420_PLANAR;
727 break;
728 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV411:
729 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV410:
730 cmd |= OCMD_YUV_410_PLANAR;
731 break;
732 }
733 } else { /* YUV packed */
734 switch (params->format & I915_OVERLAY_DEPTH_MASK) {
735 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV422:
736 cmd |= OCMD_YUV_422_PACKED;
737 break;
738 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV411:
739 cmd |= OCMD_YUV_411_PACKED;
740 break;
741 }
742
743 switch (params->format & I915_OVERLAY_SWAP_MASK) {
744 case I915_OVERLAY_NO_SWAP:
745 break;
746 case I915_OVERLAY_UV_SWAP:
747 cmd |= OCMD_UV_SWAP;
748 break;
749 case I915_OVERLAY_Y_SWAP:
750 cmd |= OCMD_Y_SWAP;
751 break;
752 case I915_OVERLAY_Y_AND_UV_SWAP:
753 cmd |= OCMD_Y_AND_UV_SWAP;
754 break;
755 }
756 }
757
758 return cmd;
759}
760
761static int intel_overlay_do_put_image(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
762 struct drm_i915_gem_object *new_bo,
763 struct put_image_params *params)
764{
765 int ret, tmp_width;
766 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs;
767 bool scale_changed = false;
768 struct drm_device *dev __diagused = overlay->dev;
769 u32 swidth, swidthsw, sheight, ostride;
770 enum i915_pipe pipe = overlay->crtc->pipe;
771
772 WARN_ON(!mutex_is_locked(&dev->struct_mutex));
773 WARN_ON(!drm_modeset_is_locked(&dev->mode_config.connection_mutex));
774
775 ret = intel_overlay_release_old_vid(overlay);
776 if (ret != 0)
777 return ret;
778
779 ret = i915_gem_object_pin_to_display_plane(new_bo, 0, NULL, NULL,
780 &i915_ggtt_view_normal);
781 if (ret != 0)
782 return ret;
783
784 ret = i915_gem_object_put_fence(new_bo);
785 if (ret)
786 goto out_unpin;
787
788 if (!overlay->active) {
789 u32 oconfig;
790 regs = intel_overlay_map_regs(overlay);
791 if (!regs) {
792 ret = -ENOMEM;
793 goto out_unpin;
794 }
795 oconfig = OCONF_CC_OUT_8BIT;
796 if (IS_GEN4(overlay->dev))
797 oconfig |= OCONF_CSC_MODE_BT709;
798 oconfig |= pipe == 0 ?
799 OCONF_PIPE_A : OCONF_PIPE_B;
800 iowrite32(oconfig, &regs->OCONFIG);
801 intel_overlay_unmap_regs(overlay, regs);
802
803 ret = intel_overlay_on(overlay);
804 if (ret != 0)
805 goto out_unpin;
806 }
807
808 regs = intel_overlay_map_regs(overlay);
809 if (!regs) {
810 ret = -ENOMEM;
811 goto out_unpin;
812 }
813
814 iowrite32((params->dst_y << 16) | params->dst_x, &regs->DWINPOS);
815 iowrite32((params->dst_h << 16) | params->dst_w, &regs->DWINSZ);
816
817 if (params->format & I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PACKED)
818 tmp_width = packed_width_bytes(params->format, params->src_w);
819 else
820 tmp_width = params->src_w;
821
822 swidth = params->src_w;
823 swidthsw = calc_swidthsw(overlay->dev, params->offset_Y, tmp_width);
824 sheight = params->src_h;
825 iowrite32(i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(new_bo) + params->offset_Y, &regs->OBUF_0Y);
826 ostride = params->stride_Y;
827
828 if (params->format & I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PLANAR) {
829 int uv_hscale = uv_hsubsampling(params->format);
830 int uv_vscale = uv_vsubsampling(params->format);
831 u32 tmp_U, tmp_V;
832 swidth |= (params->src_w/uv_hscale) << 16;
833 tmp_U = calc_swidthsw(overlay->dev, params->offset_U,
834 params->src_w/uv_hscale);
835 tmp_V = calc_swidthsw(overlay->dev, params->offset_V,
836 params->src_w/uv_hscale);
837 swidthsw |= max_t(u32, tmp_U, tmp_V) << 16;
838 sheight |= (params->src_h/uv_vscale) << 16;
839 iowrite32(i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(new_bo) + params->offset_U, &regs->OBUF_0U);
840 iowrite32(i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(new_bo) + params->offset_V, &regs->OBUF_0V);
841 ostride |= params->stride_UV << 16;
842 }
843
844 iowrite32(swidth, &regs->SWIDTH);
845 iowrite32(swidthsw, &regs->SWIDTHSW);
846 iowrite32(sheight, &regs->SHEIGHT);
847 iowrite32(ostride, &regs->OSTRIDE);
848
849 scale_changed = update_scaling_factors(overlay, regs, params);
850
851 update_colorkey(overlay, regs);
852
853 iowrite32(overlay_cmd_reg(params), &regs->OCMD);
854
855 intel_overlay_unmap_regs(overlay, regs);
856
857 ret = intel_overlay_continue(overlay, scale_changed);
858 if (ret)
859 goto out_unpin;
860
861 i915_gem_track_fb(overlay->vid_bo, new_bo,
862 INTEL_FRONTBUFFER_OVERLAY(pipe));
863
864 overlay->old_vid_bo = overlay->vid_bo;
865 overlay->vid_bo = new_bo;
866
867 intel_frontbuffer_flip(dev,
868 INTEL_FRONTBUFFER_OVERLAY(pipe));
869
870 return 0;
871
872out_unpin:
873 i915_gem_object_ggtt_unpin(new_bo);
874 return ret;
875}
876
877int intel_overlay_switch_off(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
878{
879 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs;
880 struct drm_device *dev __diagused = overlay->dev;
881 int ret;
882
883 WARN_ON(!mutex_is_locked(&dev->struct_mutex));
884 WARN_ON(!drm_modeset_is_locked(&dev->mode_config.connection_mutex));
885
886 ret = intel_overlay_recover_from_interrupt(overlay);
887 if (ret != 0)
888 return ret;
889
890 if (!overlay->active)
891 return 0;
892
893 ret = intel_overlay_release_old_vid(overlay);
894 if (ret != 0)
895 return ret;
896
897 regs = intel_overlay_map_regs(overlay);
898 iowrite32(0, &regs->OCMD);
899 intel_overlay_unmap_regs(overlay, regs);
900
901 ret = intel_overlay_off(overlay);
902 if (ret != 0)
903 return ret;
904
905 intel_overlay_off_tail(overlay);
906 return 0;
907}
908
909static int check_overlay_possible_on_crtc(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
910 struct intel_crtc *crtc)
911{
912 if (!crtc->active)
913 return -EINVAL;
914
915 /* can't use the overlay with double wide pipe */
916 if (crtc->config->double_wide)
917 return -EINVAL;
918
919 return 0;
920}
921
922static void update_pfit_vscale_ratio(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
923{
924 struct drm_device *dev = overlay->dev;
925 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
926 u32 pfit_control = I915_READ(PFIT_CONTROL);
927 u32 ratio;
928
929 /* XXX: This is not the same logic as in the xorg driver, but more in
930 * line with the intel documentation for the i965
931 */
932 if (INTEL_INFO(dev)->gen >= 4) {
933 /* on i965 use the PGM reg to read out the autoscaler values */
934 ratio = I915_READ(PFIT_PGM_RATIOS) >> PFIT_VERT_SCALE_SHIFT_965;
935 } else {
936 if (pfit_control & VERT_AUTO_SCALE)
937 ratio = I915_READ(PFIT_AUTO_RATIOS);
938 else
939 ratio = I915_READ(PFIT_PGM_RATIOS);
940 ratio >>= PFIT_VERT_SCALE_SHIFT;
941 }
942
943 overlay->pfit_vscale_ratio = ratio;
944}
945
946static int check_overlay_dst(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
947 struct drm_intel_overlay_put_image *rec)
948{
949 struct drm_display_mode *mode = &overlay->crtc->base.mode;
950
951 if (rec->dst_x < mode->hdisplay &&
952 rec->dst_x + rec->dst_width <= mode->hdisplay &&
953 rec->dst_y < mode->vdisplay &&
954 rec->dst_y + rec->dst_height <= mode->vdisplay)
955 return 0;
956 else
957 return -EINVAL;
958}
959
960static int check_overlay_scaling(struct put_image_params *rec)
961{
962 u32 tmp;
963
964 /* downscaling limit is 8.0 */
965 tmp = ((rec->src_scan_h << 16) / rec->dst_h) >> 16;
966 if (tmp > 7)
967 return -EINVAL;
968 tmp = ((rec->src_scan_w << 16) / rec->dst_w) >> 16;
969 if (tmp > 7)
970 return -EINVAL;
971
972 return 0;
973}
974
975static int check_overlay_src(struct drm_device *dev,
976 struct drm_intel_overlay_put_image *rec,
977 struct drm_i915_gem_object *new_bo)
978{
979 int uv_hscale = uv_hsubsampling(rec->flags);
980 int uv_vscale = uv_vsubsampling(rec->flags);
981 u32 stride_mask;
982 int depth;
983 u32 tmp;
984
985 /* check src dimensions */
986 if (IS_845G(dev) || IS_I830(dev)) {
987 if (rec->src_height > IMAGE_MAX_HEIGHT_LEGACY ||
988 rec->src_width > IMAGE_MAX_WIDTH_LEGACY)
989 return -EINVAL;
990 } else {
991 if (rec->src_height > IMAGE_MAX_HEIGHT ||
992 rec->src_width > IMAGE_MAX_WIDTH)
993 return -EINVAL;
994 }
995
996 /* better safe than sorry, use 4 as the maximal subsampling ratio */
997 if (rec->src_height < N_VERT_Y_TAPS*4 ||
998 rec->src_width < N_HORIZ_Y_TAPS*4)
999 return -EINVAL;
1000
1001 /* check alignment constraints */
1002 switch (rec->flags & I915_OVERLAY_TYPE_MASK) {
1003 case I915_OVERLAY_RGB:
1004 /* not implemented */
1005 return -EINVAL;
1006
1007 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PACKED:
1008 if (uv_vscale != 1)
1009 return -EINVAL;
1010
1011 depth = packed_depth_bytes(rec->flags);
1012 if (depth < 0)
1013 return depth;
1014
1015 /* ignore UV planes */
1016 rec->stride_UV = 0;
1017 rec->offset_U = 0;
1018 rec->offset_V = 0;
1019 /* check pixel alignment */
1020 if (rec->offset_Y % depth)
1021 return -EINVAL;
1022 break;
1023
1024 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PLANAR:
1025 if (uv_vscale < 0 || uv_hscale < 0)
1026 return -EINVAL;
1027 /* no offset restrictions for planar formats */
1028 break;
1029
1030 default:
1031 return -EINVAL;
1032 }
1033
1034 if (rec->src_width % uv_hscale)
1035 return -EINVAL;
1036
1037 /* stride checking */
1038 if (IS_I830(dev) || IS_845G(dev))
1039 stride_mask = 255;
1040 else
1041 stride_mask = 63;
1042
1043 if (rec->stride_Y & stride_mask || rec->stride_UV & stride_mask)
1044 return -EINVAL;
1045 if (IS_GEN4(dev) && rec->stride_Y < 512)
1046 return -EINVAL;
1047
1048 tmp = (rec->flags & I915_OVERLAY_TYPE_MASK) == I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PLANAR ?
1049 4096 : 8192;
1050 if (rec->stride_Y > tmp || rec->stride_UV > 2*1024)
1051 return -EINVAL;
1052
1053 /* check buffer dimensions */
1054 switch (rec->flags & I915_OVERLAY_TYPE_MASK) {
1055 case I915_OVERLAY_RGB:
1056 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PACKED:
1057 /* always 4 Y values per depth pixels */
1058 if (packed_width_bytes(rec->flags, rec->src_width) > rec->stride_Y)
1059 return -EINVAL;
1060
1061 tmp = rec->stride_Y*rec->src_height;
1062 if (rec->offset_Y + tmp > new_bo->base.size)
1063 return -EINVAL;
1064 break;
1065
1066 case I915_OVERLAY_YUV_PLANAR:
1067 if (rec->src_width > rec->stride_Y)
1068 return -EINVAL;
1069 if (rec->src_width/uv_hscale > rec->stride_UV)
1070 return -EINVAL;
1071
1072 tmp = rec->stride_Y * rec->src_height;
1073 if (rec->offset_Y + tmp > new_bo->base.size)
1074 return -EINVAL;
1075
1076 tmp = rec->stride_UV * (rec->src_height / uv_vscale);
1077 if (rec->offset_U + tmp > new_bo->base.size ||
1078 rec->offset_V + tmp > new_bo->base.size)
1079 return -EINVAL;
1080 break;
1081 }
1082
1083 return 0;
1084}
1085
1086/**
1087 * Return the pipe currently connected to the panel fitter,
1088 * or -1 if the panel fitter is not present or not in use
1089 */
1090static int intel_panel_fitter_pipe(struct drm_device *dev)
1091{
1092 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
1093 u32 pfit_control;
1094
1095 /* i830 doesn't have a panel fitter */
1096 if (INTEL_INFO(dev)->gen <= 3 && (IS_I830(dev) || !IS_MOBILE(dev)))
1097 return -1;
1098
1099 pfit_control = I915_READ(PFIT_CONTROL);
1100
1101 /* See if the panel fitter is in use */
1102 if ((pfit_control & PFIT_ENABLE) == 0)
1103 return -1;
1104
1105 /* 965 can place panel fitter on either pipe */
1106 if (IS_GEN4(dev))
1107 return (pfit_control >> 29) & 0x3;
1108
1109 /* older chips can only use pipe 1 */
1110 return 1;
1111}
1112
1113int intel_overlay_put_image(struct drm_device *dev, void *data,
1114 struct drm_file *file_priv)
1115{
1116 struct drm_intel_overlay_put_image *put_image_rec = data;
1117 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
1118 struct intel_overlay *overlay;
1119 struct drm_crtc *drmmode_crtc;
1120 struct intel_crtc *crtc;
1121 struct drm_gem_object *new_gbo;
1122 struct drm_i915_gem_object *new_bo;
1123 struct put_image_params *params;
1124 int ret;
1125
1126 overlay = dev_priv->overlay;
1127 if (!overlay) {
1128 DRM_DEBUG("userspace bug: no overlay\n");
1129 return -ENODEV;
1130 }
1131
1132 if (!(put_image_rec->flags & I915_OVERLAY_ENABLE)) {
1133 drm_modeset_lock_all(dev);
1134 mutex_lock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1135
1136 ret = intel_overlay_switch_off(overlay);
1137
1138 mutex_unlock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1139 drm_modeset_unlock_all(dev);
1140
1141 return ret;
1142 }
1143
1144 params = kmalloc(sizeof(*params), GFP_KERNEL);
1145 if (!params)
1146 return -ENOMEM;
1147
1148 drmmode_crtc = drm_crtc_find(dev, put_image_rec->crtc_id);
1149 if (!drmmode_crtc) {
1150 ret = -ENOENT;
1151 goto out_free;
1152 }
1153 crtc = to_intel_crtc(drmmode_crtc);
1154
1155 new_gbo = drm_gem_object_lookup(dev, file_priv,
1156 put_image_rec->bo_handle);
1157 if (new_gbo == NULL) {
1158 ret = -ENOENT;
1159 goto out_free;
1160 }
1161 new_bo = to_intel_bo(new_gbo);
1162
1163 drm_modeset_lock_all(dev);
1164 mutex_lock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1165
1166 if (new_bo->tiling_mode) {
1167 DRM_DEBUG_KMS("buffer used for overlay image can not be tiled\n");
1168 ret = -EINVAL;
1169 goto out_unlock;
1170 }
1171
1172 ret = intel_overlay_recover_from_interrupt(overlay);
1173 if (ret != 0)
1174 goto out_unlock;
1175
1176 if (overlay->crtc != crtc) {
1177 struct drm_display_mode *mode = &crtc->base.mode;
1178 ret = intel_overlay_switch_off(overlay);
1179 if (ret != 0)
1180 goto out_unlock;
1181
1182 ret = check_overlay_possible_on_crtc(overlay, crtc);
1183 if (ret != 0)
1184 goto out_unlock;
1185
1186 overlay->crtc = crtc;
1187 crtc->overlay = overlay;
1188
1189 /* line too wide, i.e. one-line-mode */
1190 if (mode->hdisplay > 1024 &&
1191 intel_panel_fitter_pipe(dev) == crtc->pipe) {
1192 overlay->pfit_active = true;
1193 update_pfit_vscale_ratio(overlay);
1194 } else
1195 overlay->pfit_active = false;
1196 }
1197
1198 ret = check_overlay_dst(overlay, put_image_rec);
1199 if (ret != 0)
1200 goto out_unlock;
1201
1202 if (overlay->pfit_active) {
1203 params->dst_y = ((((u32)put_image_rec->dst_y) << 12) /
1204 overlay->pfit_vscale_ratio);
1205 /* shifting right rounds downwards, so add 1 */
1206 params->dst_h = ((((u32)put_image_rec->dst_height) << 12) /
1207 overlay->pfit_vscale_ratio) + 1;
1208 } else {
1209 params->dst_y = put_image_rec->dst_y;
1210 params->dst_h = put_image_rec->dst_height;
1211 }
1212 params->dst_x = put_image_rec->dst_x;
1213 params->dst_w = put_image_rec->dst_width;
1214
1215 params->src_w = put_image_rec->src_width;
1216 params->src_h = put_image_rec->src_height;
1217 params->src_scan_w = put_image_rec->src_scan_width;
1218 params->src_scan_h = put_image_rec->src_scan_height;
1219 if (params->src_scan_h > params->src_h ||
1220 params->src_scan_w > params->src_w) {
1221 ret = -EINVAL;
1222 goto out_unlock;
1223 }
1224
1225 ret = check_overlay_src(dev, put_image_rec, new_bo);
1226 if (ret != 0)
1227 goto out_unlock;
1228 params->format = put_image_rec->flags & ~I915_OVERLAY_FLAGS_MASK;
1229 params->stride_Y = put_image_rec->stride_Y;
1230 params->stride_UV = put_image_rec->stride_UV;
1231 params->offset_Y = put_image_rec->offset_Y;
1232 params->offset_U = put_image_rec->offset_U;
1233 params->offset_V = put_image_rec->offset_V;
1234
1235 /* Check scaling after src size to prevent a divide-by-zero. */
1236 ret = check_overlay_scaling(params);
1237 if (ret != 0)
1238 goto out_unlock;
1239
1240 ret = intel_overlay_do_put_image(overlay, new_bo, params);
1241 if (ret != 0)
1242 goto out_unlock;
1243
1244 mutex_unlock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1245 drm_modeset_unlock_all(dev);
1246
1247 kfree(params);
1248
1249 return 0;
1250
1251out_unlock:
1252 mutex_unlock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1253 drm_modeset_unlock_all(dev);
1254 drm_gem_object_unreference_unlocked(&new_bo->base);
1255out_free:
1256 kfree(params);
1257
1258 return ret;
1259}
1260
1261static void update_reg_attrs(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
1262 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs)
1263{
1264 iowrite32((overlay->contrast << 18) | (overlay->brightness & 0xff),
1265 &regs->OCLRC0);
1266 iowrite32(overlay->saturation, &regs->OCLRC1);
1267}
1268
1269static bool check_gamma_bounds(u32 gamma1, u32 gamma2)
1270{
1271 int i;
1272
1273 if (gamma1 & 0xff000000 || gamma2 & 0xff000000)
1274 return false;
1275
1276 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
1277 if (((gamma1 >> i*8) & 0xff) >= ((gamma2 >> i*8) & 0xff))
1278 return false;
1279 }
1280
1281 return true;
1282}
1283
1284static bool check_gamma5_errata(u32 gamma5)
1285{
1286 int i;
1287
1288 for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
1289 if (((gamma5 >> i*8) & 0xff) == 0x80)
1290 return false;
1291 }
1292
1293 return true;
1294}
1295
1296static int check_gamma(struct drm_intel_overlay_attrs *attrs)
1297{
1298 if (!check_gamma_bounds(0, attrs->gamma0) ||
1299 !check_gamma_bounds(attrs->gamma0, attrs->gamma1) ||
1300 !check_gamma_bounds(attrs->gamma1, attrs->gamma2) ||
1301 !check_gamma_bounds(attrs->gamma2, attrs->gamma3) ||
1302 !check_gamma_bounds(attrs->gamma3, attrs->gamma4) ||
1303 !check_gamma_bounds(attrs->gamma4, attrs->gamma5) ||
1304 !check_gamma_bounds(attrs->gamma5, 0x00ffffff))
1305 return -EINVAL;
1306
1307 if (!check_gamma5_errata(attrs->gamma5))
1308 return -EINVAL;
1309
1310 return 0;
1311}
1312
1313int intel_overlay_attrs(struct drm_device *dev, void *data,
1314 struct drm_file *file_priv)
1315{
1316 struct drm_intel_overlay_attrs *attrs = data;
1317 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
1318 struct intel_overlay *overlay;
1319 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs;
1320 int ret;
1321
1322 overlay = dev_priv->overlay;
1323 if (!overlay) {
1324 DRM_DEBUG("userspace bug: no overlay\n");
1325 return -ENODEV;
1326 }
1327
1328 drm_modeset_lock_all(dev);
1329 mutex_lock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1330
1331 ret = -EINVAL;
1332 if (!(attrs->flags & I915_OVERLAY_UPDATE_ATTRS)) {
1333 attrs->color_key = overlay->color_key;
1334 attrs->brightness = overlay->brightness;
1335 attrs->contrast = overlay->contrast;
1336 attrs->saturation = overlay->saturation;
1337
1338 if (!IS_GEN2(dev)) {
1339 attrs->gamma0 = I915_READ(OGAMC0);
1340 attrs->gamma1 = I915_READ(OGAMC1);
1341 attrs->gamma2 = I915_READ(OGAMC2);
1342 attrs->gamma3 = I915_READ(OGAMC3);
1343 attrs->gamma4 = I915_READ(OGAMC4);
1344 attrs->gamma5 = I915_READ(OGAMC5);
1345 }
1346 } else {
1347 if (attrs->brightness < -128 || attrs->brightness > 127)
1348 goto out_unlock;
1349 if (attrs->contrast > 255)
1350 goto out_unlock;
1351 if (attrs->saturation > 1023)
1352 goto out_unlock;
1353
1354 overlay->color_key = attrs->color_key;
1355 overlay->brightness = attrs->brightness;
1356 overlay->contrast = attrs->contrast;
1357 overlay->saturation = attrs->saturation;
1358
1359 regs = intel_overlay_map_regs(overlay);
1360 if (!regs) {
1361 ret = -ENOMEM;
1362 goto out_unlock;
1363 }
1364
1365 update_reg_attrs(overlay, regs);
1366
1367 intel_overlay_unmap_regs(overlay, regs);
1368
1369 if (attrs->flags & I915_OVERLAY_UPDATE_GAMMA) {
1370 if (IS_GEN2(dev))
1371 goto out_unlock;
1372
1373 if (overlay->active) {
1374 ret = -EBUSY;
1375 goto out_unlock;
1376 }
1377
1378 ret = check_gamma(attrs);
1379 if (ret)
1380 goto out_unlock;
1381
1382 I915_WRITE(OGAMC0, attrs->gamma0);
1383 I915_WRITE(OGAMC1, attrs->gamma1);
1384 I915_WRITE(OGAMC2, attrs->gamma2);
1385 I915_WRITE(OGAMC3, attrs->gamma3);
1386 I915_WRITE(OGAMC4, attrs->gamma4);
1387 I915_WRITE(OGAMC5, attrs->gamma5);
1388 }
1389 }
1390 overlay->color_key_enabled = (attrs->flags & I915_OVERLAY_DISABLE_DEST_COLORKEY) == 0;
1391
1392 ret = 0;
1393out_unlock:
1394 mutex_unlock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1395 drm_modeset_unlock_all(dev);
1396
1397 return ret;
1398}
1399
1400void intel_setup_overlay(struct drm_device *dev)
1401{
1402 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
1403 struct intel_overlay *overlay;
1404 struct drm_i915_gem_object *reg_bo;
1405 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs;
1406 int ret;
1407
1408 if (!HAS_OVERLAY(dev))
1409 return;
1410
1411 overlay = kzalloc(sizeof(*overlay), GFP_KERNEL);
1412 if (!overlay)
1413 return;
1414
1415 mutex_lock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1416 if (WARN_ON(dev_priv->overlay))
1417 goto out_free;
1418
1419 overlay->dev = dev;
1420
1421 reg_bo = NULL;
1422 if (!OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(dev))
1423 reg_bo = i915_gem_object_create_stolen(dev, PAGE_SIZE);
1424 if (reg_bo == NULL)
1425 reg_bo = i915_gem_alloc_object(dev, PAGE_SIZE);
1426 if (reg_bo == NULL)
1427 goto out_free;
1428 overlay->reg_bo = reg_bo;
1429
1430 if (OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(dev)) {
1431 ret = i915_gem_object_attach_phys(reg_bo, PAGE_SIZE);
1432 if (ret) {
1433 DRM_ERROR("failed to attach phys overlay regs\n");
1434 goto out_free_bo;
1435 }
1436 overlay->flip_addr = reg_bo->phys_handle->busaddr;
1437 } else {
1438 ret = i915_gem_obj_ggtt_pin(reg_bo, PAGE_SIZE, PIN_MAPPABLE);
1439 if (ret) {
1440 DRM_ERROR("failed to pin overlay register bo\n");
1441 goto out_free_bo;
1442 }
1443 overlay->flip_addr = i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(reg_bo);
1444
1445 ret = i915_gem_object_set_to_gtt_domain(reg_bo, true);
1446 if (ret) {
1447 DRM_ERROR("failed to move overlay register bo into the GTT\n");
1448 goto out_unpin_bo;
1449 }
1450 }
1451
1452 /* init all values */
1453 overlay->color_key = 0x0101fe;
1454 overlay->color_key_enabled = true;
1455 overlay->brightness = -19;
1456 overlay->contrast = 75;
1457 overlay->saturation = 146;
1458
1459 regs = intel_overlay_map_regs(overlay);
1460 if (!regs)
1461 goto out_unpin_bo;
1462
1463 memset_io(regs, 0, sizeof(struct overlay_registers));
1464 update_polyphase_filter(regs);
1465 update_reg_attrs(overlay, regs);
1466
1467 intel_overlay_unmap_regs(overlay, regs);
1468
1469 dev_priv->overlay = overlay;
1470 mutex_unlock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1471 DRM_INFO("initialized overlay support\n");
1472 return;
1473
1474out_unpin_bo:
1475 if (!OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(dev))
1476 i915_gem_object_ggtt_unpin(reg_bo);
1477out_free_bo:
1478 drm_gem_object_unreference(&reg_bo->base);
1479out_free:
1480 mutex_unlock(&dev->struct_mutex);
1481 kfree(overlay);
1482 return;
1483}
1484
1485void intel_cleanup_overlay(struct drm_device *dev)
1486{
1487 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
1488
1489 if (!dev_priv->overlay)
1490 return;
1491
1492 /* The bo's should be free'd by the generic code already.
1493 * Furthermore modesetting teardown happens beforehand so the
1494 * hardware should be off already */
1495 WARN_ON(dev_priv->overlay->active);
1496
1497 drm_gem_object_unreference_unlocked(&dev_priv->overlay->reg_bo->base);
1498 kfree(dev_priv->overlay);
1499}
1500
1501struct intel_overlay_error_state {
1502 struct overlay_registers regs;
1503 unsigned long base;
1504 u32 dovsta;
1505 u32 isr;
1506};
1507
1508static struct overlay_registers __iomem *
1509intel_overlay_map_regs_atomic(struct intel_overlay *overlay)
1510{
1511 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = overlay->dev->dev_private;
1512 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs;
1513
1514 if (OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(overlay->dev))
1515 /* Cast to make sparse happy, but it's wc memory anyway, so
1516 * equivalent to the wc io mapping on X86. */
1517 regs = (struct overlay_registers __iomem *)
1518 overlay->reg_bo->phys_handle->vaddr;
1519 else
1520 regs = io_mapping_map_atomic_wc(dev_priv->gtt.mappable,
1521 i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(overlay->reg_bo));
1522
1523 return regs;
1524}
1525
1526static void intel_overlay_unmap_regs_atomic(struct intel_overlay *overlay,
1527 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs)
1528{
1529#ifdef __NetBSD__ /* XXX io mapping */
1530 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = overlay->dev->dev_private;
1531
1532 if (!OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(overlay->dev))
1533 io_mapping_unmap_atomic(dev_priv->gtt.mappable, regs);
1534#else
1535 if (!OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(overlay->dev))
1536 io_mapping_unmap_atomic(regs);
1537#endif
1538}
1539
1540
1541struct intel_overlay_error_state *
1542intel_overlay_capture_error_state(struct drm_device *dev)
1543{
1544 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
1545 struct intel_overlay *overlay = dev_priv->overlay;
1546 struct intel_overlay_error_state *error;
1547 struct overlay_registers __iomem *regs;
1548
1549 if (!overlay || !overlay->active)
1550 return NULL;
1551
1552 error = kmalloc(sizeof(*error), GFP_ATOMIC);
1553 if (error == NULL)
1554 return NULL;
1555
1556 error->dovsta = I915_READ(DOVSTA);
1557 error->isr = I915_READ(ISR);
1558 if (OVERLAY_NEEDS_PHYSICAL(overlay->dev))
1559 error->base = (__force long)overlay->reg_bo->phys_handle->vaddr;
1560 else
1561 error->base = i915_gem_obj_ggtt_offset(overlay->reg_bo);
1562
1563 regs = intel_overlay_map_regs_atomic(overlay);
1564 if (!regs)
1565 goto err;
1566
1567 memcpy_fromio(&error->regs, regs, sizeof(struct overlay_registers));
1568 intel_overlay_unmap_regs_atomic(overlay, regs);
1569
1570 return error;
1571
1572err:
1573 kfree(error);
1574 return NULL;
1575}
1576
1577void
1578intel_overlay_print_error_state(struct drm_i915_error_state_buf *m,
1579 struct intel_overlay_error_state *error)
1580{
1581 i915_error_printf(m, "Overlay, status: 0x%08x, interrupt: 0x%08x\n",
1582 error->dovsta, error->isr);
1583 i915_error_printf(m, " Register file at 0x%08lx:\n",
1584 error->base);
1585
1586#define P(x) i915_error_printf(m, " " #x ": 0x%08x\n", error->regs.x)
1587 P(OBUF_0Y);
1588 P(OBUF_1Y);
1589 P(OBUF_0U);
1590 P(OBUF_0V);
1591 P(OBUF_1U);
1592 P(OBUF_1V);
1593 P(OSTRIDE);
1594 P(YRGB_VPH);
1595 P(UV_VPH);
1596 P(HORZ_PH);
1597 P(INIT_PHS);
1598 P(DWINPOS);
1599 P(DWINSZ);
1600 P(SWIDTH);
1601 P(SWIDTHSW);
1602 P(SHEIGHT);
1603 P(YRGBSCALE);
1604 P(UVSCALE);
1605 P(OCLRC0);
1606 P(OCLRC1);
1607 P(DCLRKV);
1608 P(DCLRKM);
1609 P(SCLRKVH);
1610 P(SCLRKVL);
1611 P(SCLRKEN);
1612 P(OCONFIG);
1613 P(OCMD);
1614 P(OSTART_0Y);
1615 P(OSTART_1Y);
1616 P(OSTART_0U);
1617 P(OSTART_0V);
1618 P(OSTART_1U);
1619 P(OSTART_1V);
1620 P(OTILEOFF_0Y);
1621 P(OTILEOFF_1Y);
1622 P(OTILEOFF_0U);
1623 P(OTILEOFF_0V);
1624 P(OTILEOFF_1U);
1625 P(OTILEOFF_1V);
1626 P(FASTHSCALE);
1627 P(UVSCALEV);
1628#undef P
1629}
